br.octahedron.cloudservice.gae.ds
Class DatastoreFacadeImpl

java.lang.Object
  br.octahedron.cloudservice.gae.ds.DatastoreFacadeImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
br.octahedron.cotopaxi.cloudservice.DatastoreFacade
Direct Known Subclasses:
CachedDatastoreFacadeImpl
public class DatastoreFacadeImpl
extends Object
implements br.octahedron.cotopaxi.cloudservice.DatastoreFacade

Facade to GAE DataStore Service. Provides methods to save, load and query objects in low level.

Author:
Danilo Penna Queiroz - daniloqueiroz@octahedron.com.br
See Also:
